mapper.sql: id, `name`, `type`, isdel, creator, createdtime, updator, updatedtime, fid

id,

mapper.update:
update car
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
updatedtime = #{updatedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update car set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updatedtime = #{updatedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from car where isdel = 0 and fid = #{fid} order by createdtime desc
mapper.update: update car set isdel = 1 where id = #{id}
